attributes.action: provide the £35m required to rebuild The Royal Hospital Chelsea (home of the Chelsea pensioners) from public funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Hospital Infirmary was opened in 1964 to replace one that was destroyed in WWII. It has now reached the end of its economic life and, crucially, does not meet the current legislation for a care home.
